alert.note: Alert for Seminole (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued September 29 at 9:09AM EDT until further notice by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Florida... Little Wekiva River near Altamonte Springs 2n affecting Seminole County. .The Little Wekiva River has crested at 31.0 feet which is over one foot above the previous record flood stage. River levels will very slowly decrease over the next few hours unless additional heavy rainfall occurs over the basin. For the Little Wekiva...including Altamonte Springs 2n...Major flooding is forecast. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this evening at 1015 PM EDT. && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Major flooding is occurring and major flooding is forecast. This approaches the flood of record. * WHERE...Little Wekiva River Altamonte Springs 2n. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 29.5 feet, Major flooding in the Spring Oaks neighborhood, with rescues likely necessary. Roads impassible and several inches of water in some homes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:30 AM EDT Thursday the stage was 31.1 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:30 AM EDT Thursday was 31.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall to 28.7 feet late tomorrow evening. - Flood stage is 28.5 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (9 am) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun Mon Tue Little Wekiva River Altamonte Springs 2 28.5 31.1 Thu 8 am 28.9 MSG MSG MSG MSG &&
